General.Name: United Homes Group Inc.
General.Description: United Homes Group, Inc., a homebuilding company, engages in the design, building, and sale of homes in South Carolina, North Carolina, and Georgia. It provides detached single-family houses, as well as attached single-family houses, including duplex and town houses for entry-level buyers, first time move-ups, second time move-ups, third time move-ups, and custom builds. United Homes Group, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Chapin, South Carolina.
General.Address: 917 Chapin Road, Chapin, SC, United States, 29036
